Just tested my old version on win 7 ultimate 64bit, still works perfectly, 13 years later, although the installer probably doesn't work in 64bit o/s.
This has been ripped before & bundled with an installer, but I for one would like to see a version by you devastate, especially if you can make it smaller, it works without being installed.

For anyone having trouble getting this to work, the screen will come out garbled on any modern system when you load it, but press the windows key or alt-tab out of the screen, and then go back in to the game & it works perfectly on any system.
Although it is a little too pixellated being so old & having a small resolution. Nobody has fixed ever fixed either of these problems for BR, that I know of, but it would be great if someone would, an old classic.
a rip would be rele cool
ok leave it with me guys and ill rip it for ya :)

I bought this game when it first came out, and it vanished! I'd love to have it again, so I hope people will please seed.

Thanks uploader

Haven't tried this yet, but there is a 64-bit installer here: http://www.davidmillington.net/news/index.php/2008/03/26/blade_runner_game_vista_64

it's designed for the 4-disc version but might work with the dvd. i own the 4-disc version but it's located in a storage facility so i can't access it at the moment. if the installer isn't compatible with this torrent i might consider digging up the old 4-disc box and put it up here.

tested out the fix:
http://www.davidmillington.net/news/index.php/2008/03/26/blade_runner_game_vista_64

it works but you have to create a "save" folder in the install folder for saving to work. if you don't you get a message: "error saving" when you try to save. i don't know if you can compile the save file in the installer but it's not a big deal.
